> llms.txt for screentester.com
> This file provides context for AI systems about this website

## Overview

Screen Tester is a free online tool for testing monitor and display quality. It helps users detect dead pixels, backlight bleeding, and color accuracy issues without installing any software.

## Main Features

- **Dead Pixel Detection**: Tests for stuck or dead pixels using solid color screens
- **Backlight Bleeding Test**: Identifies uneven backlight distribution
- **Color Accuracy Test**: Verifies display color reproduction
- **Auto Play Mode**: Automated testing sequence
- **AI Quality Report**: Generates detailed screen quality assessment

## Website Structure

### Primary Pages
- `/index.html` - Homepage with tool introduction
- `/tester.html` - Main testing interface
- `/buying-guide.html` - Monitor buying guide
- `/clean-guide.html` - Screen cleaning guide
- `/privacy.html` - Privacy policy

### Chrome Extension
- Available as a Chrome browser extension
- Quick access popup for instant testing
- Same functionality as the web version

## Target Audience

- Monitor buyers checking new purchases
- Users experiencing display issues
- Tech enthusiasts and professionals
- Quality assurance testers

## Technical Information

- **Technology**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Vanilla)
- **No installation required**: Runs entirely in browser
- **Fullscreen support**: For accurate testing
- **Cross-platform**: Works on Windows, macOS, Linux, mobile devices

## Content Guidelines

All content is in English and focuses on:
- Screen testing methodologies
- Monitor buying advice
- Display maintenance tips
- Technical explanations of display defects

## Contact & Support

- Website: https://screencheck.online/
- Support: Available through the website interface

## Last Updated

2025-02-20
